dct_title_s: Map of Newport, Rhode Island, and vicinity showing the disposition of American and British forces in August 1778
dct_description_sm: Facsim. of a manuscript. Oriented with north to the right. Relief shown by hachures and shading. "Copied from the original in the possession of the Massachusetts Historical Society, 1883."
dct_subject_sm: Rhode Island, Battle of, R.I., 1778—Maps—Early works to 1800—Facsimiles
dcat_theme_sm: Rhode Island, Battle of, R.I., 1778—Maps—Early works to 1800—Facsimiles
